flawed_nl_solution:
Every person needs 2 copies and there are 9 people in the meeting so she needs 2*9 = <<2*9=81>>81 copies
The contract is 20 pages long and she has to make 81 copies so she will end up copying 20*81 = <<20*81=1620>>1620 pages
#### 1620

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 18, not 81. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
